title: The passwords generated by Apple Passwords consist of two-syllable gibberish words designed...
content:
The passwords generated by Apple Passwords consist of two-syllable gibberish words designed to be easier to input in non-optimal situations. ‚ÄúThe syllables help them to be memorable briefly, but still not memorizable.‚Äù
